pylint_message: standard import "from xmlrpclib import ExpatParser" comes before "from xmlrpc.client import ExpatParser"
bandit_issue_text: Using ExpatParser to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Use defused.xmlrpc.monkey_patch() function to monkey-patch xmlrpclib and mitigate XML vulnerabilities.
